taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section alleghenienses;species saltuensis;

treatment.description: Similar to no. 156, but primocane with only 20-30 straight prickles per dm.; petiole, petiolules and midrib beneath of leaflets scantily armed or the latter essentially unarmed; leaflets with fine double serration; terminal leaflet with broadly rounded subcordate base; inflorescence racemose-corymbiform, broadest at summit, the rachis and long (up to 5.5 cm.) pedicels only sparsely stipitate-glandular; calyx-lobes ovate, short-tipped.
